name: TrustPoint Dapp
highlights: Trustpoint allows celebrities and game studios to collaborate and create collectible NFTs through the trust of blockchain
Trustpoint has stood a winner in the EthFotAll hackathon organized by EthIndia
The smart contracts were written in solidity and were deployed on the Mantle TestNet.
MERN stack with typescript was used, talwindCSS was used as a CSS library and Prism was used as an ORM

name: ShantiTrip Holidays
highlights: ShantiTrip is a full fledged tours and travel, trip booking webapp
React with TailwindCSS was used for developing frontend and Express with Prisma for backend
TypeScript was used for strict typing and ensuring bug free production environment
Firebase was used for implementing Authentication system and an Admin Panel was provided

name: nftcar
highlights: nftcar allows you to invest in NFT Cars and the cars yield you returns and a dividend
MERN stack with typescript was used, talwindCSS was used as a CSS library and Prism was used as an ORM
Solidity was used for smart contracts and the NFTS are ERC-1155 tokens to allow multiple owners

name: Ideavault
highlights: Ideavault lets you invest in vaults (indexes) based off ideas and concepts.
React was used with Vite to develop the frontend and TailwindCSS used as CSS library
TypeScript was used for strict typing and ensuring bug free production environment
Admin panel control was provided for allowing dynamically adding content by the client

name: MarsFood
highlights: MarsFood is an end to end food delivery app catered to both consumers and restaurants.
Implemented a full fledged authentication system based on session cookies with vanilla NodeJs and Express.
Developed responsive frontend for multiple viewports using Vanilla HTML, CSS and JavaScript.

name: MarsEngine
highlights: Developed a physics engine with graphics rendering and all major physical properties
C++ was used to ensure smooth handling of heavy physics calculations
SDL2 graphics library was used to render the graphics onto the window
